SkGradientShader Class Reference

#include <SkGradientShader.h>

Inheritance diagram for SkGradientShader:

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static SkShader * CreateLinear (const SkPoint pts[2], const SkColor colors[], const SkScalar pos[], int count, TileMode mode, SkUnitMapper *mapper=nil)
static SkShader * CreateRadial (const SkPoint &center, SkScalar radius, const SkColor colors[], const SkScalar pos[], int count, TileMode mode, SkUnitMapper *mapper=nil)

Detailed Description

SkGradientShader hosts factories for creating subclasses of SkShader that render linear and radial gradients.

Member Function Documentation

static SkShader* SkGradientShader::CreateLinear (  const SkPoint  pts[2],
const SkColor  colors[],
const SkScalar  pos[],
int  count,
TileMode  mode,
SkUnitMapper *  mapper = nil
)  [static]
 

Returns a subclass of SkShader that generates a linear gradient between the two specified points. It is an error for colorCount to be < 2. The caller is responsible for decrementing the shader's reference count when it is through using the shader.

Parameters:
pts The start and end points for the gradient.
colors array[count] of colors, to be distributed between the two pts
pos array[count] of SkScalars, or nil, of the relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array. If this is nil, the the colors are distributed evenly between the start and end pt.
count the number of colors (and pos if not nil) entries. Must be >= 2.
mode The tiling mode
mapper (optional) callback to modify the spread of the colors

static SkShader* SkGradientShader::CreateRadial (  const SkPoint &  center,
SkScalar  radius,
const SkColor  colors[],
const SkScalar  pos[],
int  count,
TileMode  mode,
SkUnitMapper *  mapper = nil
)  [static]
 

Returns a subclass of SkShader that generates a radial gradient given the center and radius. It is an error for colorCount to be < 2, or for radius to be <= 0. The caller is responsible for decrementing the shader's reference count when it is through using the shader.

Parameters:
center the center of the circle for this gradient.
radius the radius of the circle for this gradient.
colors array[count] of colors, to be distributed between the center and edge of the circle
pos array[count] of SkScalars, or nil, of the relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array. If this is nil, the the colors are distributed evenly between the center and edge of the circle.
count the number of colors (and pos if not nil) entries. Must be >= 2.
mode The tiling mode
mapper (optional) callback to modify the spread of the colors
